item.title: 消息人士称，马斯克的 "星链 "已获得印度监管部门的最终批准，可以进行发射
item.description: 三位熟悉内情的消息人士告诉路透社，Starlink 公司已获得印度航天监管机构颁发的在该国开展商业运营的许可证，为这家卫星供应商进入印度市场扫清了仅存的监管障碍。【原文：Starlink has received a license from India's space regulator to launch commercial operations in the country, clearing the only remaining regulatory hurdle for the satellite provider to enter the market, three sources familiar with the matter told Reuters.】

item.title: 资深立法者表示，欧盟正在推动美国尽早减免关税，并制定 "停滞 "条款
item.description: 欧洲议会贸易委员会主席周三表示，欧盟可能即将与美国达成一项贸易协定，但在争取立即减免关税和承诺不出台新措施方面举步维艰。【原文：The European Union may be nearing a trade agreement with the United States but is struggling to obtain immediate tariff relief and a commitment not to introduce new measures, the head of the European Parliament's trade committee said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 中国人减少海外旅行，美国政策影响航空燃油需求
item.description: 今明两年，随着中国人出国旅游的减少、美国严格的移民政策使一些游客望而却步，以及飞机机队燃油效率的提高，全球航空燃油需求的复苏将放缓并停滞在大流行前的水平之下。【原文：The recovery in global jet fuel demand is set to slow and stall below pre-pandemic levels this year and next as the Chinese travel abroad less, stringent U.S. immigration policies deter some tourists and aircraft fleets become more fuel-efficient.】

item.title: 英格兰银行认为全球紧张局势带来持续的金融稳定风险
item.description: 作者：戴维-米利肯和劳伦斯-怀特【原文：By David Milliken and Lawrence White】

item.title: 特拉通公司第二季度交付量略有增长，但美国关税带来压力
item.description: 德国卡车制造商特拉顿周三报告称，尽管美国进口关税的不确定性持续存在，但第二季度的交付量同比增长了 1%。【原文：German truck maker Traton reported on Wednesday a 1% increase in second-quarter deliveries year on year despite ongoing uncertainty over U.S. import tariffs.】

item.title: 前政策制定者称，受美国关税打击影响，日本央行将在 3 月前暂缓加息
item.description: 日本央行前决策者樱井诚（Makoto Sakurai）周三表示，日本央行很可能至少在明年3月之前暂缓再次加息，以评估美国关税可能对经济造成的损害。【原文：The Bank of Japan will likely hold off raising interest rates again until at least next March to assess the damage that U.S. tariffs could inflict on the economy, former central bank policymaker Makoto Sakurai said on Wednesday.】

item.title: -蚂蚁国际 "认真考虑 "稳定币许可证申请
item.description: 一位高管周三表示，总部位于新加坡的金融科技公司蚂蚁国际正在 "认真考虑 "全球多个司法管辖区的稳定币许可证申请。【原文：Singapore-headquartered financial technology company Ant International is "seriously considering" stablecoin license applications in multiple jurisdictions around the world, an executive said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 尽管美国需求下降，大众汽车第二季度交付量仍略有增长
item.description: 德国汽车制造商大众汽车公司周三表示，尽管美国需求下降，但该公司第二季度的汽车交付量仍增长了1.2%，其中纯电动汽车（BEV）的交付量增长了37.6%。【原文：German carmaker Volkswagen saw a 1.2% rise in vehicle deliveries during the second quarter despite a drop in U.S. demand, with all-electric vehicles (BEVs) deliveries up 37.6%, the company said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 独家报道消息人士称，安巴尼的 Reliance Jio 推迟印度 IPO，2025 年上市无望
item.description: 两位熟悉内情的人士称，亿万富翁穆克什-安巴尼（Mukesh Ambani）领导的印度电信和数字巨头信实吉奥平台公司（Reliance Jio Platforms）已决定不按计划在今年启动首次公开募股（IPO），从而推迟了该国最令人期待的股票发行之一。【原文：Indian telecom and digital giant Reliance Jio Platforms, led by billionaire Mukesh Ambani, has decided not to launch its IPO this year as planned, delaying one of the country's most anticipated stock offerings, two people familiar with the matter said.】

item.title: 中国开通汽车制造商供应商付款投诉在线渠道
item.description: 中国工业部周三在网上开通了对汽车制造商承诺及时支付供应商货款的投诉渠道，并表示将与有关方面协调，帮助解决问题。【原文：China's industry ministry on Wednesday opened an online channel for complaints about automakers' pledges to make timely supplier payments, saying it will coordinate with relevant parties to help with solutions.】

item.title: 印尼关税谈判代表将在美国与卢特尼克会面，旨在兜售自然资源
item.description: 印尼一位政府官员周三表示，印尼将强调其在全球贸易中的战略重要性，特别是其自然资源，同时印尼将继续推进谈判，努力降低美国征收的32%的关税。【原文：Indonesia will highlight its strategic importance in global trade, especially its natural resources, as it forges ahead with negotiations to try to reduce a 32% tariff imposed by the United States, a government official said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 泰国准备采取12亿美元措施应对美国关税影响
item.description: 泰国财政部副部长周三表示，泰国正准备采取400多亿泰铢（约合12.2亿美元）的措施来减轻美国关税的影响。【原文：Thailand is preparing more than 40 billion baht ($1.22 billion) in measures to mitigate the impact of U.S. tariffs, a deputy finance minister said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 据《德国商报》报道，大众品牌电动汽车上半年销量增长 14
item.description: 据《德国商报》（Handelsblatt）周三报道，大众汽车的核心品牌大众（VW）今年上半年的全球电动汽车销量增长了 14.3%，德国汽车制造商在这一细分市场的欧洲领先地位得到了巩固。【原文：Volkswagen's core VW brand saw global sales volumes of electric vehicles gain 14.3% during the first half of the year as the German carmaker underscores its leading European market position in the segment, Handelsblatt reported on Wednesday.】

item.title: Viceroy Research 看空韦丹塔资源公司债务
item.description: 总部位于美国的做空机构 Viceroy Research 周三表示，已对印度矿商韦丹塔公司（Vedanta）的母公司韦丹塔资源公司（Vedanta Resources）的债务建立了做空头寸。【原文：U.S.-based short seller Viceroy Research on Wednesday said it has taken a short position against the debt of Vedanta Resources, the UK-based parent of Indian miner Vedanta .】

item.title: 部长称马来西亚不会在美国关税谈判中越过 "红线
item.description: 马来西亚贸易部长周三表示，马来西亚不会在与美国的谈判中越过某些 "红线"，马来西亚将继续与华盛顿谈判，以降低对其出口产品征收的 25% 的关税。【原文：Malaysia will not cross certain "red lines" in its negotiations with the United States, its trade minister said on Wednesday, as the country continues talks with Washington to lower a 25% tariff imposed on its exports.】

item.title: 淡马锡投资组合价值创历史新高；称美国风险可能达到顶峰
item.description: 新加坡国家投资者淡马锡周三公布，其投资组合净值同比增长11.6%，达到创纪录的4340亿新元（约合3400亿美元），并称围绕美国移民、关税和财政紧缩政策的风险很可能已经达到顶峰。【原文：Singapore's state investor Temasek reported on Wednesday an 11.6% year-on-year jump in its net portfolio value to a record S$434 billion ($340 billion), and said risks around U.S. immigration, tariff and fiscal tightening policies had likely peaked.】

item.title: 泰国航空公司首席执行官称未计划恢复美国直飞航班
item.description: 泰国国际航空公司（Thai Airways International）首席执行官柴-埃姆斯里（Chai Eamsiri）周三在路透社 NEXT 亚洲峰会上表示，尽管美国今年提升了泰国的航空安全等级，允许泰国直飞美国，但泰国国际航空公司没有计划恢复直飞美国的航班。【原文：Thai Airways International has no plans to resume direct flights to the United States, despite the U.S. upgrading Thailand's air safety rating this year to permit direct flights, CEO Chai Eamsiri told a Reuters NEXT Asia summit on Wednesday.】

item.title: 特朗普宣布对铜征收 50%关税后的市场反应
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普周二表示，他将宣布对进口铜征收50%的关税，这使得美国Comex期铜上涨超过12%，创下历史新高。【原文：U.S. President Donald Trump said on Tuesday he would announce a 50% tariff on copper imports, sending U.S. Comex copper futures up more than 12% to a record high.】

item.title: 土耳其封杀涉嫌侮辱埃尔多安的 X's Grok 聊天机器人
item.description: 由埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）创办的 xAI 公司开发的人工智能聊天机器人 Grok 在生成了包括侮辱总统塔伊普-埃尔多安（Tayyip Erdogan）的回复后，土耳其一家法院阻止了该机器人的访问。【原文：A Turkish court has blocked access to Grok, the artificial intelligence chatbot developed by the Elon Musk-founded company xAI, after it generated responses that authorities said included insults to President Tayyip Erdogan.】

item.title: 意大利联合信贷银行（UniCredit）解除德国商业银行（Commerzbank）投票权股份后，等待对 BPM 银行交易的裁决
item.description: 意大利联合信贷银行（UniCredit）针对意大利政府阻碍其以 170 亿美元竞购 Banco BPM 的条件提出上诉，法院将于周三对该上诉进行审理。【原文：An appeal by UniCredit against Italian government conditions hampering its $17 billion bid for Banco BPM will be heard by a court on Wednesday, a day after it lifted its voting stake in another target - Germany's Commerzbank .】

item.title: 澳大利亚电信公司将在企业业务改革中裁减 550 个职位
item.description: 澳大利亚最大的电信运营商澳大利亚电信集团（Telstra Group）周三表示，计划裁员 550 人，作为正在进行的企业业务改革和其他部门结构调整的一部分。【原文：Telstra Group , Australia's top telecom operator, said on Wednesday that it plans to lay off 550 employees as part of an ongoing overhaul of its enterprise business and structural changes across other parts of the organisation.】

item.title: 据 CNBC 报道，星巴克中国以高达 100 亿美元的估值吸引竞购
item.description: 据 CNBC 周三援引熟知内情的人士的话报道，星巴克中国业务吸引了潜在的股权出售报价，对该咖啡连锁店的估值高达 100 亿美元。【原文：Starbucks' China business has attracted offers for a potential stake sale, valuing the coffee chain unit at up to $10 billion, CNBC reported on Wednesday, citing people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 高盛将美国进口铜的基准关税预测上调至 50
item.description: 高盛（Goldman Sachs）周三将对美国进口铜征收 50%关税的基线从之前的 25%改为 50%。【原文：Goldman Sachs on Wednesday changed its baseline to a 50% tariff on U.S. copper imports from 25% previously.】

item.title: 广告集团 WPP 因客户控制支出而下调业绩展望，股价大跌
item.description: 广告集团 WPP 在客户于 6 月份削减支出后，于周三下调了其年度利润指导，这引发了人们对该集团在经济不确定性加剧之际应对人工智能所带来的技术变革的能力的担忧。【原文：Ad group WPP slashed its annual profit guidance on Wednesday after clients cut spending in June, raising concerns about the group's ability to deal with the technological change driven by AI at a time of intensifying economic uncertainty.】

item.title: 美国加征关税后，孟加拉国服装业就业形势严峻
item.description: 由于美国总统唐纳德-特朗普对这个南亚国家征收 35% 的关税，威胁到孟加拉国主要出口市场的订单，并压制该国最大的产业，失业的恐惧正在孟加拉国的服装中心蔓延。【原文：The fear of job losses is rippling through Bangladesh's garment hubs as U.S. President Donald Trump's 35% tariff on the South Asian nation threatens orders from its main export market and crimps the country's biggest industry.】

item.title: 据英国《金融时报》报道，默克接近以 100 亿美元收购呼吸系统制药商 Verona
item.description: 据英国《金融时报》周三报道，默克公司即将以约100亿美元的价格收购专注于肺部疾病的生物技术公司维罗纳制药公司（Verona Pharma）。【原文：Merck is nearing a roughly $10 billion deal to buy lung disease-focused biotech Verona Pharma , the Financial Times reported on Wednesday.】

item.title: 嘉能可澳大利亚煤矿工人因薪酬差距问题举行罢工
item.description: 澳大利亚矿业与能源工会（MEU）周三表示，嘉能可公司（Glencore）乌兰煤矿的工人已开始就薪酬差距问题举行24小时罢工。【原文：Australia's Mining and Energy Union (MEU) said on Wednesday that workers at Glencore's Ulan coal mine had begun a 24-hours strike over pay gap issues.】

item.title: 早间竞标特朗普的关税炮火遭遇的是谨慎而非混乱
item.description: 凯文-巴克兰对欧洲和全球市场未来一天的展望【原文：A look at the day ahead in European and global markets from Kevin Buckland】

item.title: 据《金融时报》报道，苹果公司竞购一级方程式赛车在美国的版权
item.description: 据英国《金融时报》周三报道，苹果公司正在洽谈在明年转播合同生效后获得一级方程式赛车在美国的转播权。【原文：Apple is in talks to acquire the U.S. rights to screen Formula 1 when the broadcast contract becomes available next year, Financial Times reported on Wednesday.】

item.title: 贸易官员称越南将采取措施应对美国关税
item.description: 越南贸易部副部长周三表示，越南将制定措施提高产品质量，以应对美国关税带来的潜在风险，因为越南正努力扩大对其他市场的出口，减少对美国的依赖。【原文：Vietnam will devise measures to improve product quality to cope with potential risks from U.S. tariffs, as it seeks to expand exports to other markets and reduce its reliance on the United States, the country's deputy trade minister said on Wednesday.】
